title: "Robot looks for children missing in 2011 tsunami"
excerpt: "Sendai - A technical college in Sendai has developed a self-propelled robot equipped with ground-penetrating radar, which it recently deployed to search for four elementary school children missing since the tsunami caused by the 2011 Great East Japan Earthquake."
